mapper.select: SELECT W.WARE_DATE "wareDate" , W.WARE_QTY "wareQty" , W.WARE_PRICE "warePrice" , W.S_ID "sId" , UPPER(W.ST_PAY_METHOD) "stPayMethod" , S.ST_NAME "stName" FROM WAREHOUSING W, STOCK S WHERE W.ST_NUM = S.ST_NUM AND W.S_ID = #{sId} AND TO_CHAR(W.WARE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND W.WARE_QTY > 0 AND W.WARE_PRICE > 0

SELECT S_ID , TOTAL , RECEIPT , PAY_METHOD , MILEAGE , TO_CHAR(O_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM ORDERS WHERE TO_CHAR(O_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND S_ID = #{sId} AND PAY_METHOD = 'CASH'
SELECT ST_NUM , S_ID , ST_NAME , ST_QTY , ST_AQTY , CA_NUM , ST_STATUS FROM STOCK WHERE S_ID = #{sId}
